Name: PartyHotbar
Author: Loskh
Punchline: Add a hotkey bar next to each member on one side of the PartyList Hud.
Description: Add a hotkey bar next to each member on one side of the PartyList Hud to facilitate quick skill casting on members.\nEach hotkey bar can have a maximum of 4 buttons.\nA re-login is required to enable this feature.
